name: Turok: Unity
description:
A project I thought I'd make while learning game development in unity. Making it Turok related made the whole process a lot easier and fun since I'm a big fan of the games.

This is a horde shooter where your score increases with every kill. Ammo and Health items will spawn on the map, pick them up to continue the fight and get a highscore.  A feather item will drop when you kill a special enemy, use "X" on the keyboard to get ammo or "Z" to get health.

This is a prototype to test mechanics and such.  Assets where ripped from turok 2: seeds of evil N64.

Controls

Move: WASD

Jump: Space bar

Shoot: Left click

Warblade: E

Dash: Q

Press Z to get health when in possesion of the fearther or X to get ammo.
